SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.fx

Interface FxTaskTracker

All Known Implementing Classes:
StatusBar
public interface FxTaskTracker
Interface for tracking and updating the state, progress, title, and message of a task.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateTaskMessage(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, String message)
    Updates the message associated with a specified task.
    void
    updateTaskProgress(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, double progress)
    Updates the progress of a given task.
    void
    updateTaskState(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, javafx.concurrent.Worker.State state)
    Updates the state of the specified task.
    void
    updateTaskTitle(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, String title)
    Updates the title of a given task.

  • Method Details

    • updateTaskState

      void updateTaskState(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, javafx.concurrent.Worker.State state)
      Updates the state of the specified task.
      Parameters:
      task - the task whose state is to be updated
      state - the new state to be set for the task
      See Also:
      • ProgressTracker.State

    • updateTaskProgress

      void updateTaskProgress(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, double progress)
      Updates the progress of a given task.
      Parameters:
      task - The task for which the progress is being updated.
      progress - The current progress of the task, typically a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

    • updateTaskTitle

      void updateTaskTitle(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, String title)
      Updates the title of a given task.
      Parameters:
      task - the task whose title needs to be updated
      title - the new title to set for the task

    • updateTaskMessage

      void updateTaskMessage(javafx.concurrent.Task<?> task, String message)
      Updates the message associated with a specified task.
      Parameters:
      task - the task whose message is to be updated
      message - the new message to set for the task
